Package: org.codehaus.groovy.grails.compiler.web

[Java] Class MimeTypesTransformer

    • org.codehaus.groovy.grails.compiler.web.MimeTypesTransformer
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      AnnotatedClassInjector, GrailsArtefactClassInjector

      @AstTransformer
public class MimeTypesTransformer

      Adds the withFormat and other mime related methods to controllers at compile time.

      Authors:
      Graeme Rocher
      Since:
      2.0
